definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: We might even see-saw between both counterproductive poles.
sentences.chinese: 我们甚至可能看到双方针锋相对的情况。

sentences.english: It allows both partners to keep their virginity intact for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 它保证了伴侣双方初夜之前都是处子之身。

sentences.english: The expenses on advertising and sales promotion will be shared between our two parties.
sentences.chinese: 广告和促销的费用由我们双方均摊。

sentences.english: But they disagree over the source of their disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 然两国争执的源由是双方的严重利益分歧所在。

sentences.english: He said to further enhance friendship, deepen understanding, deepen bilateral cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 他表示要进一步增进友谊，加深理解，深化双方合作。

sentences.english: Both labour and management were putting out feelers.
sentences.chinese: 劳资双方相互试探对方。

sentences.english: If neither side loses a man, each is given minus one.
sentences.chinese: 如果双方都没有人被刺中，各减一分。

sentences.english: Both of you have to discard prejudices before reaching agreement.
sentences.chinese: 你们双方只有放弃偏见才能达成一致。

sentences.english: If both sides make concessions, they can reach a settlement acceptable to both.
sentences.chinese: 双方都让点步，就能找到一个都可以接受的解决办法。

sentences.english: Do with their death bury their parents' strife.
sentences.chinese: 著实以两人的死埋葬双方父母的斗争。

sentences.english: What high-level exchanges have you had recently?
sentences.chinese: 双方最近有哪些高层交往？

sentences.english: Next year has been designated as the Year of China-Pakistan Friendship. A number of exchange activities will be held.
sentences.chinese: 明年是“中巴友好年”，双方将举办一系列交流活动。

sentences.english: Are scuppers on both ship decks effectively plugged?
sentences.chinese: 双方的甲板孔是否都已堵塞严密？
听确双方意见后再下断语。

sentences.english: Are we the mediators that pull warring sides together?
sentences.chinese: 我们是将交战双方拉近的调停者吗？

sentences.english: The award made by the Tribunal shall be final and binding upon both parities.
sentences.chinese: 该仲裁庭的裁决是终局的，对双方均具有约束力。

definition: counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
neither giving way to the other
a party (in a contract or legal case)/one side/area/region

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
all parties (in a dispute etc)/all sides/all directions
to cross swords/to have a confrontation (with sb)
